title: Stocks in the news: HCL Tech, IB Housing, Mahindra Finance, SRF and Tata Power - Economic Times
content: Stocks in the news: HCL Tech, IB Housing, Mahindra Finance, SRF and Tata Power  Economic Times
description: HCL Technologies said it has been selected to provide global service desk and on-site support to global healthcare company Novo Nordisk.
